findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25% by calling the `setTaxFeePercent` function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner by setting the `_maxTxAmount` to zero.

findings.title: MT - Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: OCTD - Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the authority to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: ULTW - Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase the amount of liquidity taken by the dev wallet, but there is no check to prevent them from increasing it beyond a reasonable percentage.

findings.title: BC - Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to blacklist specific wallets from selling tokens.
